page.title: 10Changes in the last 20 years
page.content: We asked people how the place has changed in the last 20 years.A public house,a blacksmith and a school had closed.The school had 40 pupils 20 years ago and closed 3 years ago with 11 pupils. The butcher used to kill meat on the spot. There are a lot less people than 20 years ago because there are less children now. New things in the village are an art and craft shop,a dairy has been made into an engineering work and a stone mason yard.The village hall has been improved. The village used to have a good bus service, it doesn't now. people dont go to church as much. Ellastone now share their vicar with another parish. There is less community life now in the village.
